DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety effectiveness topical bimatoprost solution enhance eyelash prominence .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Bimatoprost Solution Increasing Overall Eyelash Prominence
DOC.criteria: Dissatisfaction eyelash prominence , Eyelash prominence assessment minimal moderate , Ability provide write informed consent Subjects without visible lash , Asymmetrical ( uneven lash longer one side ) eyelash , Any eye disease abnormality , Eye surgery , Permanent eyeliner , Eyelash implant , Eyelash extension application , Any use eyelash growth product within 6 month study entry , Treatments may effect hair growth , Subjects require eye drop medication glaucoma , Subjects situation condition , study doctor feel might put risk , may make study result confuse , may interfere study .
